amendment.description: At the end of the bill before the short title, insert the following: \ SEC. 647. None of the funds made available in this Act shall be available for the development or dissemination by the Federal Highway Administration of any version of a programmatic agreement which regards the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways as eligible for inclusion on the National Register of Historic Places.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit use of funds in the bill for the development or dissemination by FHA of any version of a programmatic agreement which regards the Dwight D. Eisenhower National System of Interstate and Defense Highways as eligible for inclusion on the National Register of Historic Places.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Pombo.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Pombo amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
